metadata.Title: CVE-2016-8697 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
The bm_new function in bitmap.h in potrace before 1.13 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (divide-by-zero error and crash) viaa crafted BMP image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8697` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpotrace0 - 1.13-2
potrace - 1.13-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: potrace package in esm-infra/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13-2').
